summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2333, for the improvement of Westlake Avenue from Pike Street to Denny Way, in the City of Seattle, by installation of a system of cluster lights along the curb line on both sides of said avenue, together with the installation of such poles, conduits, and wires as may be necessary for the proper installation and equipment of said system; under Ordinance No. 24159 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
